    • Uses of Edge in game

      Methods in game that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge[] Board.getAIntersection()
      Return a 2x1 array of edges that have lines that intersect.
      Edge Node.getConnect(Node other)
      Return the road that this node shares with node other (null if not connected).
      Edge Board.getRandomEdge()
      Return a random edge in this board
      Edge Node.getRandomExit()
      Return a random edge from leaving this node (its exists)
      Edge Truck.getTravelingAlong()
      Return the edge this Truck is traveling along.
      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return the Edges in this Game,
      java.util.HashSet<Edge> Board.getEdges()
      Return the set of Edges in this board.
      java.util.HashSet<Edge> Node.getExits()
      Return a copy of the set of edges leaving this node.
      Methods in game with parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Truck.addToTravel(Edge r)
      Add road r to this Truck's travel plans, in a fashion that prevents thread collision.
      boolean Node.isExit(Edge r)
      Return true iff r is connected to this Node.
      boolean Edge.sharesExit(Edge r)
      Return true iff this Edge and r share an exit.
      Method parameters in game with type arguments of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Clear the Travel queue, then Set the travel queue to travel the given list of edges, in order.
